task.en: Open the mp4 video using Quicktime, and start playing it.
task.zh: 用Quicktime打开mp4视频，然后开始播放它。
task.ar: افتح فيديو mp4 باستخدام QuickTime، وابدأ تشغيله.
task.ja: Quicktimeでmp4動画を開き、再生を開始してください。
task.ru: Откройте mp4-видео с помощью Quicktime и начните воспроизведение.

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "QuickTime Player" to get playing of document 1' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "true" && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "1147775047-1-208.mp4" && echo "True" || echo "False"
